response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung einzuholen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without obtaining our consent? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and using personal data without proper consent. it raises a question about the importance of data privacy and security, and encourages discussion on the topic. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #security (security) are used to reach a wider audience and connect with others who are interested in the same issue.
